title: Traditional Chinese Medicine, Ziyin-Mingmu Decoction, Regulates Cholesterol Metabolism, Oxidative Stress, Inflammation and Gut Microbiota in Age-related Macular Degeneration Models.
abstract: Age-related macular degeneration (AMD) is the commonest cause of retinal disorders in the aged population. Ziyin-Mingmu decoction (ZD) has been widely used to treat AMD patients over thousands of years, however the underlying functional mechanisms of ZDÂ are largely elusive. In this study, we aim to elucidate the therapeutic mechanisms of ZD in AMD models.
